name: Skill Item
description: An item connected with your highest skill (e.g. expensive suit, false ID, brass knuckles).

name: Occupation Item
description: An essential item for your occupation (e.g. doctor's bag, car, lock picks).

name: Childhood
description: A memento from your childhood (e.g. comics, pocketknife, lucky coin).

name: Memento
description: A memento of a departed person (e.g. jewelry, a photograph in your wallet, a letter).

name: Gift
description: Something given to you by your Significant Person (e.g. a ring, a diary, a map).

name: Collection
description: Your collection. What is it? (e.g. bus tickets, stuffed animals, records).

name: Mystery Item
description: Something you found but you don't know what it is â€“ you seek answers (e.g. a letter you found in a cupboard written in an unknown language, a curious pipe of unknown origin found among your late father's effects, a curious silver ball you dug up in your garden).

name: Sport
description: A sporting item (e.g. cricket bat, a signed baseball, a fishing rod).

name: Weapon
description: A weapon (e.g. service revolver, your old hunting rifle, the hidden knife in your boot).

name: Pet
description: A pet (e.g. a dog, a cat, a tortoise).
